text: [It had a head and a face, and another head and another face.]
[At one point you stopped counting how many faces and heads it had because there were too many.]
I didn’t mean to step on you! I-I was actually just leaving-!

name: Tiana
text: I’m sorry! I’m so, so sorry! I’m gonna go!
[You tried to run away, but the blob monster shot a thing of goo at you, leaving some of the disgusting residue on your cheek.]

name: Tiana
text: Well, my momma always told me never to go down without a fight!
[You frantically search for your bag and pull out your water bottle.]

name: Tiana
text: Yeah! You’re gonna let me go or I’m gonna hit you with this! You hear me?

name: Black Blob Monster
text: You face the coursing red river…to battle violence itself…
